creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: diagonal lines extending from UR to LL with jagged and scalloped lines between; rendered in dark and light blues, grey, black, and metallic silver
marks: bottom center, in pencil: [TOUCHES 2J-C.S.B.]; LLC LRC, in pencil: [Ayomi]
title: Touches 2J-CSB
